entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
